Headline: Yellow Line Service Delayed at Dempster-Skokie
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are standing at Dempster-Skokie due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are standing at Dempster-Skokie due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

This may include the #97 Skokie bus.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
